var all = "\u200b".repeat(500);
var cmf = "%"; //명령어 접두사 (몇글자로 변경해도 상관 없습니다)
var rmf = "[!] "; //답장 접두사
var isKor = false; //한국어 지원
var items = {"물병":2000, "빵":4000, "낡은 가죽 배낭":5000, "튼튼한 가죽 배낭":13500};
var expL = [30, 50, 100, 200, 350, 550, 700, 900, 1200, 1800, 2500, 4000, 8000, 13000, 20000, 30000, 45000, 60000, 75000, 90000, 150000];
var bps = {"낡은 가죽 배낭":30, "튼튼한 가죽 배낭":70};
var jobs = ["요리사", "모험가", "학생", "선생님", "군인", "일반인", "파일럿", "주부", "사냥꾼", "프로그래머"];
spotNum=(num)=>{var isM = ""; num = num.toString(); isM = (num.includes("-")?"-":""); num = num.replace("-",""); if(num.includes("e")||num.includes("I")){ return num}; num = num.split("").reverse(); for(var i = 0; i<num.length; i++){ if(i%3==0&&i!=0){ num[i] = num[i]+","; } } return isM+num.reverse().join("") };
earnMoney=(cash, cod)=>{FileStream.write("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+cod+"/돈.txt", cash+Number(FileStream.read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+cod+"/돈.txt")))};
earnHug=(cash, cod)=>{FileStream.write("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+cod+"/허기.txt", cash+Number(FileStream.read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+cod+"/허기.txt")))};
earnWat=(cash, cod)=>{FileStream.write("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+cod+"/갈증.txt", cash+Number(FileStream.read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+cod+"/갈증.txt")))};
earnLevel=(level, cod)=>{FileStream.write("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+cod+"/레벨/레벨.txt", level+Number(FileStream.read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+cod+"/레벨/레벨.txt")))};
earnExp=(exp, cod)=>{FileStream.write("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+cod+"/레벨/경험치.txt", exp+Number(FileStream.read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+cod+"/레벨/경험치.txt")))};
earnExp2=(exp, cod)=>{FileStream.write("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+cod+"/레벨/경험치2.txt", exp)};
sum=(lst)=>{var r = 0; for(var i = 0; i<lst.length; i++){ r+=Number(lst[i]) } return r;};
function response(room, msg, sender, isGroupChat, replier, imageDB, packageName){
 create=(path, cont)=>{if(FileStream.read(path)==null){ FileStream.write(path, cont); return "1";}else{ return "";}};
 read=(path)=>{return FileStream.read(path);};
 if(room=="DEBUG ROOM") code = 0;
 var cmd = msg.replace(cmf, "");
 if(cmd==msg) cmd = "";
 var code = java.lang.String(imageDB.getProfileImage()).hashCode();
 var nickName = "#"+Math.floor(Math.random()*10000000)+1;
 if(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/돈.txt")==null) create("/sdcard/게임/유저/관리/닉네임/"+nickName+".txt", code);
 create("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/이름.txt", nickName);
 create("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/신뢰도.txt", "100");
 create("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/돈.txt", "0");
 create("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/허기.txt", "0");
 create("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/갈증.txt", "0");
 create("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/배낭.txt", "낡은 가죽 배낭");
 create("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/배낭 리스트.txt", "낡은 가죽 배낭");
 create("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/직업.txt", jobs[Math.floor(Math.random()*jobs.length)]);
 create("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/레벨/레벨.txt", "0");
 create("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/레벨/경험치.txt", "0");
 create("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/레벨/경험치2.txt", "10");
 create("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/클럽/클럽.txt", "없음");
 create("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/클럽/경험치.txt", "없음");
 create("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/인벤토리/물병.txt", "2");
 create("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/인벤토리/빈병.txt", "0");
 create("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/인벤토리/빵.txt", "5");
 create("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/인벤토리/낡은가죽배낭.txt", "1");
 create("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/인벤토리/튼튼한가죽배낭.txt", "0");
 create("/sdcard/게임/클럽/관리/클럽 목록.txt", "");
 create("/sdcard/게임/유저/관리/센더/"+(sender.replace(/[/]/g,"[[slash]]"))+".txt", read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/이름.txt"));
 var name = read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/이름.txt");
 var job = read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/직업.txt");
 var hug = Number(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/허기.txt"));
 var wat = Number(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/갈증.txt"));
 var trust = Number(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/신뢰도.txt"));
 var money = Number(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/돈.txt"));
 var clb = read("/sdcard/게임/클럽/관리/클럽 목록.txt");
 var clbE = read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/클럽/경험치.txt");
 var bpn = read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/배낭.txt");
 var bpl = read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/배낭 리스트.txt");
 var backpack = [read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/인벤토리/물병.txt"), read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/인벤토리/빵.txt"), read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/인벤토리/낡은가죽배낭.txt"), read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/인벤토리/튼튼한가죽배낭.txt"), read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/인벤토리/빈병.txt")];
 var lvl = [Number(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/레벨/레벨.txt")), Number(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/레벨/경험치.txt")), Number(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/레벨/경험치2.txt"))];
 function lvlUp(){
  if(lvl[1]>=lvl[2]){
   replier.reply(rmf+["Level Up!", "레벨 업!"][Number(isKor)]+"\n레벨업 하였습니다. ("+lvl[0]+" -> "+(1+lvl[0])+")\n얻은 돈 : "+spotNum((lvl[0]+1)*2000)+"$");
   earnMoney((lvl[0]+1)*2000);
   earnExp2(expL[lvl[0]], code);
   earnLevel(1, code);
   earnExp(-lvl[1], code);
  }
 }
 if(cmd==["help", "도움말"][Number(isKor)]){
  var help = [["help", "help <cmd>", "profile", "profile <nick name>", "backpack", "market", "buy <item>", "sell <item>", "use <item>", "donate <nick name>::<money>", "mine"], ["도움말", "도움말 <명령어>", "내정보", "정보 <닉네임>", "배낭", "상점", "구매 <아이템>", "판매 <아이템>", "사용 <아이템>", "송금 <이름>::<돈>", "광질"]];
  replier.reply(rmf+["Help", "게임 도움말"][Number(isKor)]+all+"\n\n\n"+cmf+help[Number(isKor)].join("\n"+cmf)/*+"\n\n- 태그 -\n"+["<cmd> : 명령어\n<money> : 돈 수량\n<nick name> : 유저 닉네임\n<item> : 아이템 이름", "<명령어> : 명령어\n<돈> : 돈 수량\n<닉네임> : 유저 닉네임\n<아이템> : 아이템 이름"][Number(isKor)]*/);
 }else if(cmd.indexOf(["help ", "도움말 "][Number(isKor)])==0){
  var tag_c = cmd.substr([5, 4][Number(isKor)]);
  var cmds = [{"help":"게임 도움말 목록 출력", "help <cmd>":"<cmd> 명령어 정보 출력", "profile":"프로필 정보 출력", "profile <nick name>":"<nick name> 유저의 정보 출력", "backpack":"아이템 소유 정보 출력", "market":"게임 상점에 방문", "buy <item>":"<item> 아이템 구매", "use <item>":"<item> 사용 혹은 착용", "sell <item>":"<item> 을 판매합니다", "donate <nick name>::<money>":"<nick name> 에게 <money>$ 를 기부", "mine":"광질.\n최대 1,000$, 최소 100$"}, {"도움말":"게임 도움말 목록 출력", "도움말 <명령어>":"<명령어> 명령어 정보 출력", "프로필":"프로필 정보 출력","사용 <아이템>":"<아이템> 사용 혹은 착용", "프로필 <닉네임>":"<닉네임> 유저의 정보 출력", "배낭":"아이템 소유 정보 출력", "상점":"게임 상점에 방문", "구매 <아이템>" : "<item> 아이템 구매", "판매 <아이템>":"<아이템> 판매", "송금 <닉네임>::<돈>":"<닉네임> 에게 <돈>$ 를 기부", "광질":"광질.\n최대 1,000$, 최소 100$"}];
  var search = cmds[Number(isKor)][tag_c];
  if(search==undefined){
   replier.reply(rmf+"해당 명령어를 찾을 수 없습니다."+all+"\n• 다음을 확인해 보세요 : 태그(<>) 와 같이 입력하기");
  }else{
   replier.reply(rmf+["Help","도움말"][Number(isKor)]+" \""+tag_c+"\"\n"+search);
  }
 }else if(cmd==["profile", "내정보"][Number(isKor)]){
  replier.reply(rmf+["Profile Info", "프로필 정보"][Number(isKor)]+all+"\n\n\n닉네임 : "+name+"\n직업 : "+job+"\n돈 : "+spotNum(돈)+"$\n신뢰도 : "+spotNum(trust)+"%\n배고픔 : "+spotNum(hug)+"\n갈증 : "+spotNum(wat)+"\n배낭 : "+bpn+"\n레벨 : "+spotNum(lvl[0])+" ("+spotNum(lvl[1])+"/"+spotNum(lvl[2])+")\n["+"█".repeat(Math.floor(10*(lvl[1]/lvl[2])))+"▒".repeat(10-Math.floor(10*(lvl[1]/lvl[2])))+"]\n\n- 클럽 -\n소속 클럽 : "+clb+"\n클럽 경험치 : "+spotNum(clbE));
 }else if(cmd.indexOf(["profile ", "정보 "][Number(isKor)])==0){
  var nameS = cmd.substr([8, 3][Number(isKor)]);
  nameS = read("/sdcard/게임/유저/관리/닉네임/"+nameS+".txt");
  if(nameS==null){
   if(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/관리/센더/"+cmd.substr([8,3][Number(isKor)]).replace(/[/]/g,"[[slash]]")+".txt")!=null){
    try{
     var sc = read("/sdcard/게임/유저/관리/닉네임/"+read("/sdcard/게임/유저/관리/센더/"+cmd.substr([8,3][Number(isKor)]).replace(/[/]/g,"[[slash]]")+".txt")+".txt");
     replier.reply(rmf+["Profile Searched", "프로필 검색됨"][Number(isKor)]+all+"\n\n\n닉네임 : "+read("/sdcard/게임/유저/관리/센더/"+cmd.substr([8,3][Number(isKor)]).replace(/[/]/g,"[[slash]]")+".txt")+"\n직업 : "+read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+sc+"/직업.txt")+"\n돈 : "+spotNum(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+sc+"/돈.txt"))+"$\n신뢰도 : "+spotNum(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+sc+"/신뢰도.txt"))+"%\n배고픔 : "+spotNum(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+sc+"/허기.txt"))+"\n갈증 : "+spotNum(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+sc+"/갈증.txt"))+"\n배낭 : "+(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+sc+"/배낭.txt"))+"\n레벨 : "+spotNum(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+sc+"/레벨/레벨.txt"))+" ("+spotNum(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+sc+"/레벨/경험치.txt"))+"/"+spotNum(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+sc+"/레벨/경험치2.txt"))+")\n["+"█".repeat(Math.floor(10*(Number(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+sc+"/레벨/경험치.txt"))/Number(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+sc+"/레벨/경험치2.txt")))))+"▒".repeat(10-Math.floor(10*(Number(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+sc+"/레벨/경험치.txt"))/Number(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+sc+"/레벨/경험치2.txt")))))+"]\n\n- 클럽 -\n소속 클럽 : "+(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+sc+"/클럽/클럽.txt"))+"\n클럽 경험치 : "+spotNum(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+sc+"/클럽/경험치.txt")));
    }catch(e){
     replier.reply(rmf+"예기치 못한 에러가 발생 했습니다.");
    }
   }else{
    replier.reply(rmf+"해당 닉네임의 사용자를 찾을 수 없습니다.");
   }
  }else{
   replier.reply(rmf+["Profile Info", "프로필 정보"][Number(isKor)]+all+"\n\n\n닉네임 : "+cmd.substr([8, 3][Number(isKor)])+"\n직업 : "+read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+nameS+"/직업.txt")+"\n돈 : "+spotNum(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+nameS+"/돈.txt"))+"$\n신뢰도 : "+spotNum(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+nameS+"/신뢰도.txt"))+"%\n배고픔 : "+spotNum(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+nameS+"/허기.txt"))+"\n갈증 : "+spotNum(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+nameS+"/갈증.txt"))+"\n배낭 : "+read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+nameS+"/배낭.txt")+"\n레벨 : "+spotNum(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+nameS+"/레벨/레벨.txt"))+" ("+spotNum(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+nameS+"/레벨/경험치.txt"))+"/"+spotNum(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+nameS+"/레벨/경험치2.txt"))+")\n["+"█".repeat(Math.floor(10*(Number(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+nameS+"/레벨/경험치.txt"))/Number(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+nameS+"/레벨/경험치2.txt")))))+"▒".repeat(10-Math.floor(10*(Number(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+nameS+"/레벨/경험치.txt"))/Number(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+nameS+"/레벨/경험치2.txt")))))+"]\n\n- 클럽 -\n소속 클럽 : "+read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+nameS+"/클럽/클럽.txt")+"\n클럽 경험치 : "+spotNum(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+nameS+"/클럽/경험치.txt")));
  }
 }else if(cmd==["backpack", "배낭"][Number(isKor)]){
  replier.reply(rmf+["BackPack (", "배낭 ("][Number(isKor)]+spotNum(sum(backpack))+"/"+spotNum(bps[bpn])+")"+all+"\n\n\n- 식료품 -\n물병 : "+spotNum(backpack[0])+"\n빵 : "+spotNum(backpack[1])+"\n\n- 소지품 -\n빈 병 : "+backpack[4]+"\n\n- 배낭 -\n낡은 가죽 배낭 : "+backpack[2]+(bpn=="낡은 가죽 배낭"?" (착용중)":"")+"\n튼튼한 가죽 배낭 : "+backpack[3]+(bpn=="튼튼한 가죽 배낭"?" (착용중)":""));
 }else if(cmd.indexOf(["donate ", "송금 "][Number(isKor)])==0){
  var am = Number(cmd.substr([7, 3][Number(isKor)]).split("::")[1]);
  var pm = cmd.substr([7,3][Number(isKor)]).split("::")[0];
  if(am>money){
   replier.reply(rmf+"돈이 부족하여 송금 할 수 없습니다.");
  }else{
   if(am<0||isNaN(am)||Math.floor(am)!=am){
    replier.reply(rmf+"송금 할 수 없습니다.");
   }else{
    if(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/관리/닉네임/"+pm+".txt")==null){
     replier.reply(rmf+"해당 닉네임의 사용자를 찾을 수 없습니다.");
    }else{
     replier.reply(rmf+["Donate", "송금"][Number(isKor)]+"\n송금을 완료하였습니다.");
     earnMoney(am, read("/sdcard/게임/유저/관리/닉네임/"+pm+".txt"));
     earnMoney(-am, code);
    }
   }
  }
 }else if(cmd==["market", "상점"][Number(isKor)]){
  replier.reply(rmf+["Market", "상점"][Number(isKor)]+all+"\n\n\n• 물병\n가격 : 2,000$\n설명 : 배고픔 -10, 갈증 -30\n\n• 빵\n가격 : 4,000$\n설명 : 배고픔 -80\n\n• 낡은 가죽 배낭\n"+(bpl.includes("낡은 가죽 배낭") ? "이미 보유한 상품입니다."+(bpn=="낡은 가죽 배낭"?" (착용중)":""):"가격 : 5,000$\n설명 : 인벤토리 공간 30")+"\n\n• 튼튼한 가죽 배낭\n"+(bpl.includes("튼튼한 가죽 배낭") ? "이미 보유한 상품입니다."+(bpn=="튼튼한 가죽 배낭"?" (착용중)":""):"가격 : 13,500$\n설명 : 인벤토리 공간 70")+"\n\n\n%"+["buy <item>","구매 <아이템>"][Number(isKor)]+" : 해당 아이템을 구매합니다.");
 }else if(cmd.indexOf(["buy ", "구매 "][Number(isKor)])==0){
  var buyI = cmd.substr([4, 3][Number(isKor)]);
  var buys = ["물병","빵","낡은 가죽 배낭","튼튼한 가죽 배낭"];
  var buyC = items[buyI];
  if(buyC==undefined){
   replier.reply(rmf+"해당 아이템을 찾을 수 없습니다.");
  }else{
   if(money<buyC){
    replier.reply(rmf+"돈이 부족하여 구매 할 수 없습니다.");
   }else{
    if(bps[bpn]>sum(backpack)){
     if(msg.includes("배낭")||msg.includes("가방")){
      FileStream.append("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/배낭 리스트.txt", "\n"+buyI);
     }
     earnExp((Math.floor(buyC/100)), code);
     if(bpl.includes(buyI)!=true){
      FileStream.write("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/인벤토리/"+(buyI.replace(/ /g,""))+".txt", Number(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/인벤토리/"+(buyI.replace(/ /g,"")+".txt")))+1);
      replier.reply(rmf+["Market","상점"][Number(isKor)]+"\n"+buyI+" 아이템을 구매 하였습니다.\n(경험치 +"+spotNum(Math.floor(buyC/100))+")");
      lvl = [Number(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/레벨/레벨.txt")), Number(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/레벨/경험치.txt")), Number(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/레벨/경험치2.txt"))];
      lvlUp();
      earnMoney(-buyC, code);
     }
    }else{
     replier.reply(rmf+"가방 용량이 부족합니다.");
    }
   }
  }
 }else if(cmd.indexOf(["sell ", "판매 "][Number(isKor)])==0){
  var selI = cmd.substr([5, 3][Number(isKor)]);
  var selC = Math.floor(items[selI]/100);
  if(typeof items[selI]=="undefined"){
   replier.reply(rmf+"해당 아이템이 없습니다.");
  }else if(Number(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/인벤토리/"+selI.replace(/ /g,""))+".txt")<=0){
   replier.reply(rmf+"해당 아이템을 소유하고 있지 않습니다.");
  }else{
   FileStream.write("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/인벤토리/"+selI.replace(/ /g,"")+".txt", Number(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/인벤토리/"+selI.replace(/ /g,"")+".txt"))-1);
   replier.reply(rmf+["Sell", "판매 완료"][Number(isKor)]+"\n판매하여 얻은 돈 : "+spotNum(selC)+"$");
   earnMoney(selC, code);
  }
 }else if(cmd.indexOf(["use ", "사용 "][Number(isKor)])==0){
  var useI = cmd.substr([4, 3][Number(isKor)]);
  var uses = ["물병", "빵", "낡은 가죽 배낭", "튼튼한 가죽 배낭"];
  if(uses.indexOf(useI)==-1){
   replier.reply(rmf+"해당 아이템이 없습니다.");
  }else{
   if(Number(backpack[uses.indexOf(useI)])<=0){
    replier.reply(rmf+"해당 아이템을 소유하고 있지 않습니다.");
   }else{
    if(useI=="물병"){
     replier.reply(rmf+"물병을 사용 하였습니다.\n(경험치 +15, 배고픔 -10, 갈증 -30)\n획득 아이템 : 빈 병");
     earnHug(-10, code);
     earnWat(-30, code);
     earnExp(15, code);
     FileStream.write("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/인벤토리/빈병.txt", Number(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/인벤토리/빈병.txt"))+1);
     FileStream.write("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/인벤토리/"+(useI.replace(/ /g,""))+".txt", Number(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/인벤토리/"+(useI.replace(/ /g,""))+".txt"))-1);
     lvl = [Number(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/레벨/레벨.txt")), Number(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/레벨/경험치.txt")), Number(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/레벨/경험치2.txt"))];
     lvlUp();
    }else if(useI=="빵"){
     FileStream.write("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/인벤토리/"+(useI.replace(/ /g,""))+".txt", Number(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/인벤토리/"+(useI.replace(/ /g,""))+".txt"))-1);
     replier.reply(rmf+"빵을 사용 하였습니다.\n(경험치 +20, 배고픔 -80)");
     earnHug(-80, code);
     earnExp(20, code);
     lvl = [Number(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/레벨/레벨.txt")), Number(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/레벨/경험치.txt")), Number(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/레벨/경험치2.txt"))];
     lvlUp();
    }else if(useI=="낡은 가죽 배낭"){
     if(bpn=="낡은 가죽 배낭"){
      replier.reply(rmf+"이미 착용중인 아이템 입니다.");
     }else{
      FileStream.write("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/배낭.txt", useI);
      replier.reply(rmf+"낡은 가죽 배낭을 착용 하였습니다.\n(인벤토리 용량 : "+spotNum(bps[bpn])+" -> "+spotNum(bps["낡은 가죽 배낭"])+")")
     }
    }else if(useI=="튼튼한 가죽 배낭"){
     if(bpn=="튼튼한 가죽 배낭"){
      replier.reply(rmf+"이미 착용중인 아이템 입니다.");
     }else{
      FileStream.write("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/배낭.txt", useI);
      replier.reply(rmf+"튼튼한 가죽 배낭을 착용 하였습니다.\n(인벤토리 용량 : "+spotNum(bps[bpn])+" -> "+spotNum(bps["튼튼한 가죽 배낭"])+")")
     }
    }
    var t = [];
   }
  }
 }else if(cmd==["mine", "광질"][Number(isKor)]){
  if(hug<=90){
   if(wat<=70){
    earnHug(5, code);
    earnWat(3, code);
    var mine_C = Math.floor(Math.random()*900)+100
    replier.reply(rmf+["Mine", "광질"][Number(isKor)]+"\n광질을 하여 "+spotNum(mine_C)+"$ 를 얻었습니다.\n(경험치 +3, 배고픔 +5, 갈증 +3)");
    earnMoney(mine_C, code);
    lvl = [Number(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/레벨/레벨.txt")), Number(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/레벨/경험치.txt")), Number(read("/sdcard/게임/유저/정보/"+code+"/레벨/경험치2.txt"))];
    earnExp(3, code);
    lvlUp();
   }else{
    replier.reply(rmf+"갈증이 70 보다 커서 일을 할 수 없습니다.");
   }
  }else{
   replier.reply(rmf+"배고픔이 90 보다 커서 일을 할 수 없습니다.");
  }
 }
}
/* isKor 이 true 면 (접두사 + 도움말)
false 면 (접두사 + help) 로 명령어 출력*/
Colored by Color Scripter

article.subject: 그냥 게임 #1

cafe.introduction: 자바스크립트를 사용하는 카카오톡 봇 관련 커뮤니티 입니다.
cafe.name: 카카오톡 봇 커뮤니티
